Want to celebrate the great work of #localgov? Join us for @ELGL50’s #CityHallSelfie Day on Aug 15! All you have to do is take a photo in front of your fav govt building & use the hashtag #CityHallSelfie. Learn more at https://t.co/tdOHt5OZuH.

tweets.text: Want to celebrate the great work of #localgov? Join us for @ELGL50’s #CityHallSelfie Day on Aug 15! All you have to do is take a photo in front of your fav govt building & use the hashtag #CityHallSelfie. Learn more at https://t.co/tdOHt5OZuH.
Thanks @NASBO for an amazing conference - huge side benefit was getting to meet @sjharkins in person! And yes I now know that @CityHallSelfie is in fact August 15! https://t.co/Oc0jsnZqGW

Thank you to everyone who attended and made our #NASBO22 Annual Meeting a success. It is always a pleasure to catch up with our budget family and friends. See you at #NASBO23 in Delaware! https://t.co/47GcukKiCI
#CityHallSelfie Day is back! Monday, August 15th. We hope you join us, get outside, and have some fun showing local gov love! 📱🤳https://t.co/XVLqwCtxwX https://t.co/Jqh62OV13d

It’s been awesome being in @CityOfBoise for the @NASBO summer meeting (joining @MIStateBudget director @CM_Harkins). While at @ELGL50 we’re focused on local gov we love our state gov partners. Don’t forget to join us for #CityHallSelfie Day on 8/15! https://t.co/Pxj14hMG9K
